taskbody.context: After defining the setup configuration file, execute the silent installation on the endpoint.

step.cmd: If the Agent installer package is downloaded from , within the config file, the values of the product_serial_number and txon_license_env should be automatically generated. Please specify password and set the silent value to 1 in the configuration file. If you would like to manage the agent using , please configure the server session host value with the server IP address.

note.p: For standalone agents, refer to for more details.

step.cmd: Place the defined file in the installation package.
Choose one of the methods to launch the installer.

choice.p: For a silent installation with a GUI, double-click the installer .
For a silent installation without any GUI, use the command prompt to execute with the argument -s, e.g., type C:\package>StellarSetup.exe -s

Please note that with this method, the message box mentioned in the following steps will not be shown. To view information related to the installation, check logs filed under C:\Windows\Temp\StellarProtect.

step.cmd: After the installation is complete, the StellarProtect has been successfully installed message box will appear. Click Finish.
Run OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME and log on with the configured password.
After successfully logging on OFFICIAL_PRODUCT_NAME, the Overview window will be displayed.
